damage_formula.clan_boss: 3% of target MAX HP (some sources say 4%)
damage_formula.description: Warmaster deals bonus damage as percentage of target's MAX HP. Higher proc chance than Giant Slayer (60% vs 30%), but single proc per skill. Damage can not crit.

proc_mechanics.multi_hit_interaction: Only procs ONCE per skill use, regardless of number of hits (A1/A2/A3 treated as single skill use)
proc_mechanics.glancing_hit_interaction: Glancing hits CANNOT crit, therefore CANNOT proc Warmaster
proc_mechanics.notes: Best for 1-2 hit champions. For multi-hit champions (3+ hits), Giant Slayer is better.

unm_clan_boss_200m_hp.notes: Against UNM Clan Boss (200M HP), Warmaster procs deal 6M damage (3% of 200M)

expected_damage_per_turn_100_crit.description: With 100% C.RATE, Warmaster averages 3.6M damage per skill use (60% × 6M)
expected_damage_per_turn_100_crit.notes: Over 50 turns (typical UNM fight), Warmaster contributes ~180M damage if every turn procs (unrealistic, assumes 100% C.RATE and no glancing hits)

actual_damage_per_turn_with_variance.description: With weak affinity (30% glancing), effective proc chance drops to 42% (60% × 70%), averaging 2.52M per turn
actual_damage_per_turn_with_variance.notes: Affinity CRITICAL for Warmaster damage. Weak affinity = -30% Warmaster procs.

geomancer.notes: Geomancer C.RATE 57% → 100% = +82M Warmaster damage over 50 turns (unrealistic max, assumes no glancing hits and every turn procs)

geomancer_realistic.notes: REALISTIC: Geomancer with 100% C.RATE averages 30 Warmaster procs over 50 turns (60% proc × 50 turns), contributing ~180M from Warmaster alone (NOT accounting for affinity variance)

heart_of_glory.effect: +5% damage when attacking with full health
heart_of_glory.synergy: Boosts Warmaster damage by 5% when at full HP
heart_of_glory.notes: Common pairing for Arena or Lifesteal Set users

single_out.effect: +8% damage to targets with less than 40% HP
single_out.synergy: Boosts Warmaster damage by 8% when boss below 40% HP (last ~20 turns of UNM fight)

life_drinker.effect: Heals by 5% of damage inflicted when attacking with 50% HP or less
life_drinker.synergy: Warmaster procs (6M damage) heal for 300k HP when below 50% HP
life_drinker.notes: Synergizes well for survivability in long fights

vs_giant_slayer.warmaster_best_for: 1-2 hit champions (A1/A2/A3 with single hit or double hit)
vs_giant_slayer.giant_slayer_best_for: 3+ hit champions (multi-hit skills like Coldheart A3)
vs_giant_slayer.calculation: Warmaster: 60% × 1 proc = 60% effective proc. Giant Slayer: 30% × 3 hits = ~65% effective proc (1 - (0.7)³ = 0.657).

examples.geomancer: A1 (1 hit), A2 (1 hit), A3 (1 hit AOE) = Warmaster better (60% × 1 = 60% vs 30% × 1 = 30%)
examples.brogni: A1 (1 hit), A2 (1 hit AOE), A3 (1 hit AOE) = Warmaster better (passive reflection counted separately)
examples.coldheart: A1 (1 hit), A2 (3 hits), A3 (4 hits) = Giant Slayer better (30% × 4 = ~76% proc chance vs 60% × 1)

fire_knight_interaction.description: Warmaster damage does NOT count as hit for Fire Knight shield reduction. Use multi-hit champions for Fire Knight, not Warmaster reliance.
fire_knight_interaction.notes: Fire Knight requires actual hits to reduce shield, not bonus damage from masteries

metadata.validation: Cross-referenced with in-game testing (Geomancer damage contribution), community calculators
metadata.notes: Comprehensive Warmaster mechanics for damage attribution modeling and mastery selection
